The Gaia repository containing both essential and optional addons. The repository holds addons that are needed to install Gaia, but also has optional third-party addons that can be installed to extended the functionality of Gaia.
extension.disclaimer: Gaia and its developers are not affiliated with Kodi or any of the services used in the addon. Gaia and its developers do not create, host, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon. Gaia simply searches publicly available sources for content. Gaia is, and always will be, free and open-source. None of its code or resources may be sold or redistributed for commercial purposes.

extension.summary: Addon repository of the Kodinerds Community
extension.description: The 'Nerdsrepo' is the Repository of the german Kodi Community 'Kodinerds' (www.kodinerds.net). Most of the hosted Addons here are active developed and supported by the members of the Community. Nerdsrepo is an unofficial Repository of the Kodi Media Center Software

Das 'Nerdsrepo' ist das Addon Repository der deutschen Kodi-Community 'Kodinerds' (www.kodinerds.net). Die meisten der hier im Nerdsrepo gehosteten Addons werden von den Mitgliedern der Community aktiv entwickelt und unterstützt. Das Nerdsrepo ist ein unoffizielles Repository der Kodi Media Center Software.
